3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and projection; geometry is clean and logically cut away.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful; wall partitions and proportions match the source 2D plan precisely.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement, scale, and room logic are correct and consistent with the floor plan.

visual_clarity.notes: High structural clarity, but points deducted for text labels remaining on the floors in the 3D space.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are superimposed/baked into the 3D floor texture.

summary: High-fidelity conversion that maintains exact geometric proportions and architectural layout with professional 3D clarity.
